bibl.title: Letter from Blanca Malaret to Philip Showalter Hench, March 17, 1941

div1.p: Malaret informs Hench that Ramos is away but will schedule an appointment with Hench when he returns.

div1.head: Letter from Blanca Malaret to Philip Showalter Hench, March 17, 1941
div1.opener:
REPUBLICA DE CUBA
--
INSTITUTO TECNICO DE SALUBRIDAD RURAL
--------
MARIANAO, HABANA, CUBA.
--
DIRECTOR
Havana,
March 17, 1941.
Dr. P. S. Hench
Mayo Clinic
Rochester, Minn.
Dear Dr. Hench:
div1.p:
Your letter of the 15th inst. was recei-
ved by Dr. Domingo Ramos who left for New
Orleans on the same date, for which reason he
was unable to answer it personally.

Dr. Ramos is expected to return to
Havana on or about March 24th, so I am quite
sure that he will be very pleased to give you
an appointment when you come to Havana.

closer.signed:
Blanca Malaret
Secretary to Dr. Ramos
